anathema: Cower from fights, despoil the land, kill the innocent
edict: Take what you want, indulge in base desires, feast on luxurious food, kill  demons  and  evil  creatures
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Sobek (The Raging Torrent)](/Deities.aspx?ID=642)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 6

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Take what you want, indulge in base desires, feast on luxurious food, kill [demons](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=387) and [evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64) creatures

**Anathema** Cower from fights, despoil the land, kill the innocent

**Area of Concern**
Crocodiles, fertility, military prowess, rivers

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy or unholy

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

**Favored Weapon** [Falchion](/Weapons.aspx?ID=373)

**Domains** [Dragon](/Domains.aspx?ID=106), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=83), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90), [Water](/Domains.aspx?ID=98)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Hydraulic Push](/Spells.aspx?ID=1561)

- **3rd**
[Feet to Fins](/Spells.aspx?ID=1525)

- **4th**
[Dinosaur Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=1489)
(appears as crocodile)

</column>
name: Sobek (The Raging Torrent)
